attributes.action: 100% tax relief for free fruit in the workplace schemes
attributes.additional_details:
As part of the 5 a day, we need to promote eating of fresh fruit and vegetables.

Companies would offer fruit in the office and workplace in the morning and afternoon and the cost of the fruit or scheme would be a 100% deductible for companies in the scheme.

This would promote healthy choices in the work place and will have a added benefit to the economy.

This effect all department of Government so is a cabinet issue to push through.
